Description: secure-config-us-east-1.yml Production-grade, fully-parameterized security configuration for a financial services environment (PCI-DSS oriented). Deploys in us-east-1 by default. - KMS CMK(s) with rotation - S3 buckets encrypted with KMS + enforce HTTPS + SSE enforcement - CloudTrail (multi-region) -> encrypted S3 + CloudWatch Logs - AWS Config (CIS conformance pack + recorder & delivery) - VPC with public/private/isolated subnets (dynamic) - RDS in private/isolated subnets (encrypted, secrets in SecretsManager) - Least-privilege IAM roles, SSM patch automation, CloudWatch alarms, WAF + CloudFront

Owner.Description: Owner/team tag to apply to resources

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix to append to resource names to avoid conflicts between deployments

BucketNamePrefix.Description: Optional prefix to guarantee bucket-name uniqueness (leave empty to let CFN generate names)

PublicSubnetMask.Description: Additional subnet bits for Fn::Cidr (public). Example: 8 -> /24 when VPC is /16

PrivateSubnetMask.Description: Additional subnet bits for Fn::Cidr (private). Example: 8 -> /24 when VPC is /16

IsolatedSubnetMask.Description: Additional subnet bits for Fn::Cidr (isolated). Example: 8 -> /24 when VPC is /16

CreateNatGateways.Description: Create NAT Gateways for private subnets? (true|false)

PatchWindowCron.Description: Cron schedule for the patch maintenance window (SSM). Use CloudWatch cron format.

PatchWindowTimezone.Description: Timezone for the maintenance window schedule (e.g., UTC, US/Eastern)

DBAllocatedStorage.Description: Allocated storage for DB (GB), ignored for Aurora where appropriate

CreateCloudFront.Description: Create CloudFront distribution + WAF for public-facing content (true|false)

ACMCertificateArn.Description: (Optional) ACM certificate ARN (must be in us-east-1 for CloudFront). Leave empty to use CloudFront default cert.

AdminCIDR.Description: CIDR block for admin access (SSH/management). Strongly recommended to supply secure CIDR.

LogGroupNamePrefix.Description: Optional prefix for CloudWatch Log Group names to ensure uniqueness across deployments

ExistingCloudTrailArn.Description: ARN of existing CloudTrail trail to use (leave empty to create new trail)

CreateConfigRecorder.Description: Create new AWS Config recorder (true|false). Set to false if one already exists in the region.

Description.Fn::Sub: Primary CMK for ${Environment} - encryption for logs, cloudtrail, s3, rds

Properties.GroupDescription: Database security group - only allow from app SG

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: MySQL (or DB port) access from App tier

Properties.Description: Patch baseline for EC2 instances (security critical)

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm fired when CloudTrail logs show unauthorized API calls

ExistingCloudTrailArnOutput.Description: ARN of the existing CloudTrail trail being used

DatabaseSecretArn.Description: ARN of the database credentials secret
